directions.step:
Method: Combine all ingredients in a blender for 1 minute. Let stand overnight [refrigerated]. Bottle the next day. No waiting time. From Bobbi Zee. Canned milk is simply evaporated milk; Eagle brand is very much sweetened - different products. This calls for Scotch whisky, not Irish whiskey. Yes, they are spelled differently and, yes, they taste different.
Posted to FOODWINE Digest 09 Dec 96
From: Bob Pastorio <pastorio@RICA.NET>
Date: Mon, 9 Dec 1996 18:56:25 -0800
